question: Which disease is ZP-PTH used for?
ideal_answer: ZP-PTH is used for the treatment of osteoporosis.

snippets.text: Parathyroid hormone (1-34)-coated microneedle patch system: clinical pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics for treatment of osteoporosis.
To evaluate the clinical PK/PD of PTH(1-34) delivered by a novel transdermal drug-coated microneedle patch system (ZP-PTH) for the treatment of osteoporosis.
